title: A supersymmetric spin current
authors:
Casey Cartwright, Domingo Gallegos, Umut G\"ursoy, Roi Klein, Amos
  Yarom
abstract:
We study the supersymmetric structure of the spin current in four dimensional
$\mathcal{N}=1$ supersymmetric theories. By coupling the stress tensor
multiplet to a vierbein multiplet we identify a spin current with the Hodge
dual of the bottom component of the stress tensor multiplet in a wide range of
theories. This implies that in holographic theories the Hodge dual of the $R$
current may serve as a spin current, paving the way for holographic studies of
theories with background torsion.
